# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_subdirectory(ut_utils)

add_executable(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut)


target_compile_options(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_include_directories(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/client/ydb_topic
)

target_link_libraries(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  cpp-client-ydb_topic
  cpp-testing-gmock_in_unittest
  core-testlib-default
  public-lib-json_value
  public-lib-yson_value
  cpp-client-ydb_driver
  cpp-client-ydb_persqueue_public
  client-ydb_persqueue_public-impl
  ydb_persqueue_public-ut-ut_utils
  client-ydb_topic-include
  client-ydb_topic-common
  client-ydb_topic-impl
  ydb_topic-ut-ut_utils
  tx-schemeshard-ut_helpers
  persqueue-ut-common
)

target_allocator(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)

target_link_options(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_sources(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/client/ydb_topic/ut/basic_usage_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/client/ydb_topic/ut/describe_topic_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/client/ydb_topic/ut/local_partition_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/client/ydb_topic/ut/topic_to_table_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/public/sdk/cpp/client/ydb_topic/ut/trace_ut.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  10
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut
  PROPERTY
  TIMEOUT
  600
)

vcs_info(ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-public-sdk-cpp-client-ydb_topic-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
